title: OnePlus 10R launches in India in 80W and 150W fast charging variants
content:
OnePlus smartphones have been at the forefront of charging tech since the early days of the company, going as far back as the OnePlus 2. While they do get some flak for sticking to proprietary charging tech, there’s no denying that OnePlus smartphones have regularly been one of the fastest charging phones you could purchase.

The post OnePlus 10R launches in India in 80W and 150W fast charging variants appeared first on XDA.
description: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 10R in India in 80W and 150W "Endurance Edition" variants. Check out the latest flagship!
